00048 /* Private constants ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00049 #define CLASS_REQ_20_SET_LINE_CODING        (0x20)
00050 #define CLASS_REQ_21_GET_LINE_CODING        (0x21)
00051 #define CLASS_REQ_22_SET_CONTROL_LINE_STATE (0x22)
00052 
00053 #define CDC_INF_NUM                         (11)
00054 #define CDC_EPT_IN_LENGTH                   (_EP1LEN)
00055 #define CDC_EPT                             (USBD_EPT1)
00056 
00057 #define BUF_SIZE                            (512) //Don't set just enough buffers.
00058

00085 /* Private variables ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00086 static u32 gCDCEPOUTLen = 0;
00087 static vu32 gIsCDCEPINEmpty = TRUE;
00088 static u32 gIsZLP_Require = FALSE;
00089 static USBDClass_VCP_LINE_CODING USBDClassVCPLineCoding;
00090 
00091 __ALIGN4 static u8 gInputDataBuffer[64];
00092 __ALIGN4 static u8 gOutputDataBuffer[64];
00093 __ALIGN4 static u8 gRingDataBuffer[BUF_SIZE];
00094 static u32 gIsDataReady = FALSE;
00095 static u32 gBufferIndex = 0;
00096 static Buffer_TypeDef gRingBuffer;

00098 /* Global Function -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00099 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00100   * @brief  USB Class initialization.
00101   * @param  pClass: pointer of USBDCore_Class_TypeDef
00102   * @retval None
00103   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00104 void USBDClass_Init(USBDCore_Class_TypeDef *pClass)
00105 {
00106   Buffer_Init(&gRingBuffer, gRingDataBuffer, BUF_SIZE);
00107 
00108   pClass->CallBack_MainRoutine.func = USBDClass_MainRoutine;
00109   //pClass->CallBack_MainRoutine.uPara = (u32)NULL;
00110 
00111   pClass->CallBack_Reset.func = USBDClass_Reset;
00112   //pClass->CallBack_Reset.uPara = (u32)NULL;
00113 
00114   //pClass->CallBack_StartOfFrame.func = USBDClass_StartOfFrame;
00115   //pClass->CallBack_StartOfFrame.uPara = (u32)NULL;
00116 
00117   //pClass->CallBack_ClassGetDescriptor = USBDClass_Standard_GetDescriptor
00118   //pClass->CallBack_ClassSetInterface = USBDClass_Standard_SetInterface;
00119   //pClass->CallBack_ClassGetInterface = USBDClass_Standard_GetInterface;
00120 
00121   pClass->CallBack_ClassRequest = USBDClass_Request;
00122   pClass->CallBack_EPTn[1] = USBDClass_Endpoint1;
00123   pClass->CallBack_EPTn[2] = USBDClass_Endpoint2;
00124   pClass->CallBack_EPTn[3] = USBDClass_Endpoint3;
00125   //pClass->CallBack_EPTn[4] = USBDClass_Endpoint4;
00126   //pClass->CallBack_EPTn[5] = USBDClass_Endpoint5;
00127   //pClass->CallBack_EPTn[6] = USBDClass_Endpoint6;
00128   //pClass->CallBack_EPTn[7] = USBDClass_Endpoint7;
00129 
00130   #ifdef RETARGET_IS_USB
00131   pClass->CallBack_EPTn[RETARGET_RX_EPT] = SERIAL_USBDClass_RXHandler;
00132   #endif
00133 
00134   return;
00135 }
00136 
00137 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00138   * @brief  USB Class CDC send data.
00139   * @param  pFrom: Source buffer
00140   * @param  len: Length for write IN data
00141   * @retval Total length written by this function
00142   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00143 s32 USBDClass_CDC_Tx(u32 *pFrom, u32 len)
00144 {
00145   /* Demo how to send data by Virtual COM IN endpoint                                                       */
00146   /* !!! For the Bulk endpoint, the data length must be N - 1 or N with ZLP (Zero Length Package).          */
00147   /* Where N is the max length of endpoint.                                                                 */
00148   if (gIsCDCEPINEmpty == TRUE)
00149   {
00150     gIsCDCEPINEmpty = FALSE;
00151     USBDCore_EPTWriteINData(CDC_EPT, (u32 *)pFrom, len);
00152     if (len == CDC_EPT_IN_LENGTH)
00153     {
00154       if (Buffer_isEmpty(&gRingBuffer) == TRUE)
00155       {
00156         gIsZLP_Require = TRUE; // Data Length = Endpoint maximum Length, need ZLP.
00157       }
00158     }
00159     return len;
00160   }
00161   else
00162   {
00163     return -1;
00164   }
00165 }
00166 
00167 /* Private functions ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00168 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00169   * @brief  USB Class main routine.
00170   * @param  uPara: Parameter for Class main routine
00171   * @retval None
00172   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00173 static void USBDClass_MainRoutine(u32 uPara)
00174 {
00175   USBDClass_CDC_ZLPProcess();
00176   USBDClass_CDC_Rx();
00177   return;
00178 }
00179 
00180 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00181   * @brief  USB Class CDC ZLP Process for application.
00182   * @retval None
00183   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00184 static void USBDClass_CDC_ZLPProcess(void)
00185 {
00186   u32 *nullptr = 0;
00187   if (gIsZLP_Require == TRUE && gIsCDCEPINEmpty == TRUE)
00188   {
00189     gIsZLP_Require = FALSE;
00190     gIsCDCEPINEmpty = FALSE;
00191     USBDCore_EPTWriteINData(CDC_EPT, (u32 *)nullptr, 0);
00192   }
00193 
00194   return;
00195 }
00196 
00197 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00198   * @brief  USB Class CDC Rx Process.
00199   * @retval None
00200   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00201 static void USBDClass_CDC_Rx(void)
00202 {
00203   /* Demo how to check Virtual COM RingBuffer data is empty or not                                          */
00204   if (Buffer_isEmpty(&gRingBuffer) == FALSE)
00205   {
00206     // !!! Add your data process here
00207 
00208     gBufferIndex = Buffer_GetLength(&gRingBuffer);
00209     if (gBufferIndex > 64)
00210     {
00211       gBufferIndex = 64;
00212     }
00213     gIsDataReady = TRUE;
00214   }
00215 
00216   /* Loop Back data to the Tx                                                                               */
00217   #if 1
00218   if (gIsDataReady == TRUE && gIsCDCEPINEmpty == TRUE)
00219   {
00220     Buffer_Read(&gRingBuffer, gInputDataBuffer, gBufferIndex);
00221     if (USBDClass_CDC_Tx((u32 *)gInputDataBuffer, gBufferIndex) == gBufferIndex)
00222     {
00223       gIsDataReady = FALSE;
00224     }
00225   }
00226   #endif
00227 
00228   return;
00229 }
00230 
00231 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00232   * @brief  USB Class Reset.
00233   * @param  uPara: Parameter for Class Reset.
00234   * @retval None
00235   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00236 static void USBDClass_Reset(u32 uPara)
00237 {
00238   gIsCDCEPINEmpty = TRUE;
00239   gIsZLP_Require = FALSE;
00240 
00241   gIsDataReady = FALSE;
00242 }
00243 
00244 #if 0

00246   * @brief  USB Class Start of Frame.

00248   * @retval None
00249   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00250 /*

00252 {
00253 
00254 }

00256 #endif

00258 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00259   * @brief  USB Device Class Request
00260   * @param  pDev: pointer of USB Device
00261   * @retval None
00262   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00263 static void USBDClass_Request(USBDCore_Device_TypeDef *pDev)
00264 {
00265   u8 USBCmd = *((u8 *)(&(pDev->Request.bRequest)));
00266   u16 len = *((u16 *)(&(pDev->Request.wLength)));
00267 
00268 #ifdef RETARGET_IS_USB
00269   SERIAL_USBDClass_Request(pDev);
00270 #endif
00271 
00272   switch (USBCmd)
00273   {
00274     case CLASS_REQ_22_SET_CONTROL_LINE_STATE:
00275     {
00276       if (len == 0)
00277       {
00278         USBDClass_SetControlLineState(pDev);
00279       }
00280       break;
00281     }
00282     case CLASS_REQ_20_SET_LINE_CODING:
00283     {
00284       USBDClass_SetLineCoding(pDev);
00285       break;
00286     }
00287     case CLASS_REQ_21_GET_LINE_CODING:
00288     {
00289       USBDClass_GetLineCoding(pDev);
00290       break;
00291     }
00292     // others not support
00293     default:
00294     {
00295       break;
00296     }
00297   }
00298 
00299   return;
00300 }
00301 
00302 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00303   * @brief  USB Device Class Request - Set Line Coding
00304   * @param  pDev: pointer of USB Device
00305   * @retval None
00306   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00307 static void USBDClass_SetLineCoding(USBDCore_Device_TypeDef *pDev)
00308 {
00309   pDev->Transfer.pData = (uc8*)&USBDClassVCPLineCoding;
00310   pDev->Transfer.sByteLength = (sizeof(USBDClassVCPLineCoding) > pDev->Request.wLength) ? (pDev->Request.wLength) : (sizeof(USBDClassVCPLineCoding));
00311   pDev->Transfer.Action = USB_ACTION_DATAOUT;
00312   return;
00313 }
00314 
00315 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00316   * @brief  USB Device Class Request - Get Line Coding
00317   * @param  pDev: pointer of USB Device
00318   * @retval None
00319   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00320 static void USBDClass_GetLineCoding(USBDCore_Device_TypeDef *pDev)
00321 {
00322   pDev->Transfer.pData = (uc8*)&USBDClassVCPLineCoding;
00323   pDev->Transfer.sByteLength = (sizeof(USBDClassVCPLineCoding) > pDev->Request.wLength) ? (pDev->Request.wLength) : (sizeof(USBDClassVCPLineCoding));
00324   pDev->Transfer.Action = USB_ACTION_DATAIN;
00325   return;
00326 }
00327 
00328 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00329   * @brief  USB Device Class Request - Set Control Line State
00330   * @param  pDev: pointer of USB Device
00331   * @retval None
00332   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00333 static void USBDClass_SetControlLineState(USBDCore_Device_TypeDef *pDev)
00334 {
00335   pDev->Transfer.pData = 0;
00336   pDev->Transfer.sByteLength = 0;
00337   pDev->Transfer.Action = USB_ACTION_DATAOUT;
00338 
00339   return;
00340 }
00341 
00342 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00343   * @brief  USB Class Endpoint handler
00344   * @param  EPTn: USB Endpoint number
00345   *         @arg USBD_EPT0 ~ USBD_EPT7
00346   * @retval None
00347   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00348 static void USBDClass_Endpoint1(USBD_EPTn_Enum EPTn)
00349 {
00350   gIsCDCEPINEmpty = TRUE;
00351   return;
00352 }
00353 
00354 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00355   * @brief  USB Class Endpoint handler
00356   * @param  EPTn: USB Endpoint number
00357   *         @arg USBD_EPT0 ~ USBD_EPT7
00358   * @retval None
00359   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00360 static void USBDClass_Endpoint2(USBD_EPTn_Enum EPTn)
00361 {
00362   return;
00363 }
00364 
00365 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00366   * @brief  USB Class Endpoint handler
00367   * @param  EPTn: USB Endpoint number
00368   *         @arg USBD_EPT0 ~ USBD_EPT7
00369   * @retval None
00370   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00371 static void USBDClass_Endpoint3(USBD_EPTn_Enum EPTn)
00372 {
00373   /* Read Receive data.                                                                                     */
00374   gCDCEPOUTLen = USBDCore_EPTReadOUTData(EPTn, (u32 *)gOutputDataBuffer, 64);
00375 
00376   /* Move Receive data to Ring Buffer.                                                                      */
00377   if (Buffer_Write(&gRingBuffer, gOutputDataBuffer, gCDCEPOUTLen) != gCDCEPOUTLen)
00378   {
00379   /* Ring Buffer Overflow.                                                                                  */
00380     while(1);
00381   }
00382 
00383   __DBG_USBPrintf("%06ld CDC OUT\t[%02d]", ++__DBG_USBCount, (int)gCDCEPOUTLen);
00384   __DBG_USBDump((uc8 *)gOutputDataBuffer, gCDCEPOUTLen);
00385 
00386   return;
00387 }
